Class AbstractDatabase<ItemType extends DatabaseItem>

java.lang.Object
AbstractDatabase<ItemType>
Type Parameters:
ItemType - the type of item the database stores
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database<ItemType>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountDB, ApptDB, ApptOutDB, InventoryDB, PatientRecordDB, ReplenishmentDB, StaffRecordDB
public abstract class AbstractDatabase<ItemType extends DatabaseItem> extends Object implements Database<ItemType>
Abstract implementation of database
